title: Look at my last game: why can't rito fix this broken game?

replies.body: Looking at your post history, it looks like you are bad and are blaming the system in illogical ways instead of trying to get better.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-02T23:53:46.513+0000)
>
> Looking at your post history, it looks like you are bad and are blaming the system in illogical ways instead of trying to get better.

Nice, no arguments, next.

> [{quoted}](name=carcaroff,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-03T00:02:00.456+0000)
>
> Nice, no arguments, next.

I do not have a need to argue with immature pedants to bolster my ego.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T00:47:58.398+0000)
>
> I do not have a need to argue with immature pedants to bolster my ego.

If you have no arguments, don't post then.

Posting an inane messsage and, when someone notices it, saying "i don't need to bla bla" is a 12yold thing.

I see you lack arguments in other threads too, so.

> [{quoted}](name=carcaroff,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T00:59:59.783+0000)
>
> If you have no arguments, don't post then.
> 
> Posting an inane messsage and, when someone notices it, saying "i don't need to bla bla" is a 12yold thing.
> 
> I see you lack arguments in other threads too, so.

You seem to have missed the point completely.

It is not that i have no arguments, it is that i dont give a fuck because i am not here to argue.

Try it sometimes, it may make you a happier, less angry person.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T02:19:27.636+0000)
>
> You seem to have missed the point completely.
> 
> It is not that i have no arguments, it is that i dont give a fuck because i am not here to argue.
> 
> Try it sometimes, it may make you a happier, less angry person.

XD

That's why we have 10 bans bro. If you dislike seeing the combo, ban Kog or Lulu. Or pick a disrupting support such as Blitzcrank, Braum, or Nautilus. They do wonders. You could also pick Alistar.

Sona wasn't the most optimal choice. I don't see too many Sonas this season.
The 0/6/9 Sona game? Looks pretty normal to me...

> [{quoted}](name=Leylania,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-02T23:43:08.167+0000)
>
> The 0/6/9 Sona game? Looks pretty normal to me...

It's normal that 2 vs 5 win the game cause broken cahmps? Yes, it's the norm, at it's bad. Hence my "why rito can't fix this?".

> [{quoted}](name=carcaroff,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T00:03:37.285+0000)
>
> It's normal that 2 vs 5 win the game cause broken cahmps? Yes, it's the norm, at it's bad. Hence my "why rito can't fix this?".

how was it 2 vs 5? kills were 27:25 , looks more like a team skill issue them a broken champ issue. Even your Akali had more kills and any single person on the other team.

> [{quoted}](name=Warios,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T00:16:14.256+0000)
>
> how was it 2 vs 5? kills were 27:25 , looks more like a team skill issue them a broken champ issue. Even your Akali had more kills and any single person on the other team.

Kog + Lulu...it's broken, i saw it before and now happened again, so it's definitely a thing. I had a nice team, they played way better than them, thier top sucked hard, then the match started going like this: Kog walks with Lulu behind, she spams abilities on him, Kog wins everything.
Literally a joke of a match ruined by this.
And kog had the pug skin, which made it even more cancerous.

It's broken, needs a fix, this is what i'm saying.

> [{quoted}](name=carcaroff,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7O9LYEUA,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-03T01:06:14.297+0000)
>
> Kog + Lulu...it's broken, i saw it before and now happened again, so it's definitely a thing. I had a nice team, they played way better than them, thier top sucked hard, then the match started going like this: Kog walks with Lulu behind, she spams abilities on him, Kog wins everything.
> Literally a joke of a match ruined by this.
> And kog had the pug skin, which made it even more cancerous.
> 
> It's broken, needs a fix, this is what i'm saying.

Did you happen to notice they were a premade duo team, played last 18/20 games together?  Is a factor in the games outcome as well, lulu with a 70% win rate, running a streak as well.

BTW, what champs did you ban if you hate Kog/Lulu so much?
